DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : There two goal prospective single arm study ; see increase amount gadolinium 24 hour urine collection follow infusion treatment Calcium Zinc DTPA , see reduction elimination gadolinium deposition disease ( GDD ) symptom . DOC.brief_title: Effects IV-Administered Ca-DTPA Zn-DTPA To Treat Patients With Gadolinium Deposition Disease
